Press Releases.Title: 2 New Cases of Locally Transmitted Covid-19 Infection
Press Releases.MainContent:
1. As of 8 January 2021, 12pm, the Ministry of Health (MOH) has preliminarily confirmed 2 new cases of locally transmitted COVID-19 infection. Based on our investigations so far, the cases are in the community and had been placed on quarantine earlier. There are no new cases in the dormitories.

2. In addition, there are 21 imported cases, who had already been placed on Stay-Home Notice upon arrival in Singapore. In total, there are 23 new cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore today.

3. We are still working through the details of the cases, and further updates will be shared via the MOH press release that will be issued tonight.


MINISTRY OF HEALTH
8 JANUARY 2021
